name: Knights Radiant
description:
Small project made for a class assignment. 

The game is inspired by The Stormlight Archive book series by Brandon Sanderson. You will play as a character from one of the ten orders of the Knights Radiant, each one with an unique set of powers. You can only select between three orders for the time being.

Controls

  • Edgedancer: Use Left Shift to activate Abrasion.
  • Lightweaver: Use Left Shift to activate Illumination.
  • Windrunner: Use the arrow keys to activate Gravitation.
